Download TIGER shapes for Roads

Source: R/roads.R
tt_roads.Rd

Download TIGER shapes for Roads

Usage

tt_roads(state, county, year = 2021)

Arguments

state

FIPS, postal codes, or full names of states.

county

FIPS codes or full names of counties. Optional.

year

Integer year. Required. 2000 and 2010-2021 are currently supported.

Value

sf data.frame

Examples

tt_roads("DE")
#> Simple feature collection with 34448 features and 4 fields
#> Geometry type: LINESTRING
